title: Cabernet Sauvignon
description: This robust red wine boasts flavors of black cherry and blackberry, with subtle notes of vanilla and oak. Pair with grilled meats or hearty pasta dishes for a satisfying meal.

title: Sauvignon Blanc
description: This fresh and aromatic white wine is bursting with flavors of lemon, grapefruit, and tropical fruit. Enjoy as an aperitif or pair with light seafood dishes.

title: Chardonnay
description: This full-bodied white wine is rich and buttery, with flavors of vanilla, caramel, and toasted oak. Pair with creamy pasta dishes or roasted chicken.

title: Pinot Noir
description: This delicate red wine has flavors of red cherry, raspberry, and hints of earthiness. Enjoy with grilled salmon or roasted pork tenderloin.

title: Malbec
description: This bold and fruity red wine has flavors of blackberry, plum, and a touch of smokiness. Pair with grilled meats or strong cheeses.

title: Merlot
description: This smooth and easy-drinking red wine has flavors of black cherry, plum, and a hint of chocolate. Pair with burgers or pizza for a casual meal.

title: Riesling
description: This sweet and floral white wine has flavors of honey, apricot, and peach. Enjoy with spicy Asian cuisine or as a dessert wine.

title: Zinfandel
description: This bold and spicy red wine has flavors of blackberry, raspberry, and a hint of cinnamon. Pair with barbecue or spicy foods for a delicious meal.

title: Syrah
description: This full-bodied red wine has flavors of blackberry, smoked meat, and black pepper. Pair with roasted meats or hearty stews for a satisfying meal.

title: Chianti
description: This classic Italian red wine has flavors of cherry, plum, and a touch of earthiness. Pair with tomato-based pasta dishes or grilled meats.

title: Sangiovese
description: This Italian red wine has flavors of red cherry, raspberry, and a hint of spice. Pair with roasted vegetables or tomato-based pasta dishes.

title: Grenache
description: This medium-bodied red wine has flavors of red fruit, black pepper, and a hint of smokiness. Pair with grilled meats or roasted vegetables.

title: Viognier
description: This full-bodied white wine has flavors of peach, apricot, and a touch of honey. Pair with roasted chicken or creamy pasta dishes.
